title: The Immunization Well-Child Toolkit
description: Find resources to inform patients about vaccine-preventable diseases and vaccines.
cleaned_text: The Immunization Well-Child Toolkit Find resources to inform patients about vaccine-preventable diseases and vaccines. On this page [Skip this page navigation](#toc-end) Overview The Immunization Well-Child Toolkit is intended to assist health care providers in communicating information about infectious diseases and the importance of vaccines in preventing many of these diseases. What's in the toolkit Handouts for parents [Tips for a positive immunization experience](/document/immunization-well-child-toolkit/tips-parents-positive-immunization-experience)encourages parents to take steps before, during, and after a vaccine for a better immunization experience. [If you choose not to vaccinate your child](/document/immunization-well-child-toolkit/risks-and-responsibilities-choosing-not-vaccinate-your-child), understand the risks and responsibilities. [Vaccine safety is important to all of us](/document/immunization-well-child-toolkit/vaccine-safety-important-all-us), providing information to parents regarding vaccine safety.
